posts.post_content:
Posted By: Richard
Evening Folks,

   After putting together a Toronto near-subset (12/13) of C46s, I'm thinking about taking a run at the set.  I have a few bucks in my Paypal account and a couple things I could trade...Anyone interested in parting with some C46s?  I need McGinley of Toronto and every other non-Toronto card, so it's pretty wide open.

Graded or non-graded, but probably just presentable vg-ex or so.

Email or post.

Thanks in advance!

Richard.

Posted By: Richard
Email sent Mr. Murray.

Whew, this has been a productive thread!  Steve and I just pulled off a blockbuster deal (thank you!), so I no longer need any Toronto cards, nor do I need these other 11 cards:

Abstein
Baberich
Baxter
Brockett
Butler
Doescher
Hughes
McAllister
Mitchell
Pierce
Truesdale


And Eric, I've sent you an email regarding Carlo.


Regards,

Richard.
